A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, beautiful movie that was shockingly bad and leaves little reason to care about the characters or the whole franchise in general. I appreciate a movie that takes risks\, but not one that makes you question why you cared about the movie's universe at all. While it looked beautiful\, the paper thin characters some how felt even thinner by the end of it. The one exception being Kylo Ren - sorta. His idea of burning the past to escape it is kinda interesting. But you feel zero pathos for him\, so he too eventually falls flat. \n\nWay to ruin it Disney.
